title: KIMOBER 50 Gram Mixed Craft Sequins and Spangles,Iridescent Blue Assorted Shapes & Sizes Sequins for Nails, DIY Arts Crafts
features: Package Includes: 50g/1.76oz iridescent blue loose sequins in assorted shapes:stars,moon, flowers, shells,diamond,heart,dot,circles,petal and irregular patterns.Sufficient quantity and abundant shapes to meet your needs for DIY crafts.

Size & Materia: The diameters of crafts sequins in our assorted spangles set are 3-8 mm/ 0.12-0.31inch.(Small parts ,keep away from your kids )These rainbow sequins are made of quality PVC material, smooth and durable for ornaments using.

Sparkly Blue Sequins Glitter: Thesh sequins appear bright blue at first glance , but if you look at them from a different angle, they have a different color effect.Transparent and opaque sequins work together to create a perfect multicolored effect and add glamour to your crafts.
Easy to use: The polychrome glitter are easy to operate and friendly to beginners, and can be glued to the place you want to apply with crystal drops, hot melts and glue.

Ideal Embellishment: You can use your imagination and creativity to apply the multicolored sequins wherever you find it interesting,such as scrapbooking,crafts making,slime charms,DIY project works,Christmas ball decoration,nail art,mobile phone decoration,body and face makeup,jewellery making.
